comment: This day will never be forgotten. My prayers to the hostages & families. So sad!

(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (f / forget-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG1 (d / day
                  :mod (t / this))
            :time (e / ever))
      :snt2 (p / pray-01

            :ARG2 (a / and
                  :op1 (h / hostage)
                  :op2 (f2 / family)))
